title: "Talons" square 3D shadowed display sans caps
content:
anybody familiar with the 3d shadowed font that spells out “TALONS”? thanks in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030832im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TALONS_4743.jpg)

 [‹ Handwritten script for childrens education](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030832/http:/typophile.com/node/40544 "Go to previous forum topic") [New American Gladiators Look ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030832/http:/typophile.com/node/40663 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content: Since nobody else has responded, I’ll tell you that the closest I could find was Dimitris Kolyris’s [Data Trash](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030832/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?q=data+trash&nb_ppp_old=50&page=1&text=TALON&nb_ppp=50&psize=m&classt=alpha).
Wouldn’t your first thought be that someone drew that? It sure looks like custom pen and ink work to me.
